text: Surjoux-Lhopital is a new commune. It is in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region in the Ain department in east France. It was founded on 1 January 2019. It is made of the former communes of Surjoux and Lhôpital.Arrêté préfectoral, 3 December 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Ain
title: Surjoux-Lhopital
